Returns: the value of the metric or -1 if it is not available.
Parameters: int: the metric to retrieve Value is @B_android#view#FrameMetrics#UNKNOWN_DELAY_DURATION_E@, @B_android#view#FrameMetrics#INPUT_HANDLING_DURATION_E@, @B_android#view#FrameMetrics#ANIMATION_DURATION_E@, @B_android#view#FrameMetrics#LAYOUT_MEASURE_DURATION_E@, @B_android#view#FrameMetrics#DRAW_DURATION_E@, @B_android#view#FrameMetrics#SYNC_DURATION_E@, @B_android#view#FrameMetrics#COMMAND_ISSUE_DURATION_E@, @B_android#view#FrameMetrics#SWAP_BUFFERS_DURATION_E@, @B_android#view#FrameMetrics#TOTAL_DURATION_E@, @B_android#view#FrameMetrics#FIRST_DRAW_FRAME_E@, @B_android#view#FrameMetrics#INTENDED_VSYNC_TIMESTAMP_E@, or @B_android#view#FrameMetrics#VSYNC_TIMESTAMP_E@
getMetric(int).Description: Retrieves the value associated with Metric identifier id for this frame. Boolean metrics are represented in [0,1], with 0 corresponding to false, and 1 corresponding to true.

Parameters: FrameMetrics: the FrameMetrics object to copy.
FrameMetrics(android.view.FrameMetrics).Description: Constructs a FrameMetrics object as a copy. Use this method to copy out metrics reported by @B_android#view#Window#OnFrameMetricsAvailableListener#onFrameMetricsAvailable_E@

ClassDesc: Class containing timing data for various milestones in a frame lifecycle reported by the rendering subsystem. Supported metrics can be queried via their corresponding identifier.
